description.p: Upgraded offline data storage to handle storing more information, added additional metadata fields for user-defined data, enhanced support for HTML markup, and various bug fixes.

discussion.p: The technology through which downloaded and user-input data is temporarily saved ("persisted") on the mobile device before uploading to the server has been changed. These changes should have little user-visible effect, but will allow the app to support a much larger amount of data in a more robust manner. The migration from the previous form of persistence storage to the new is performed automatically.

Additional form instance metadata fields have been added that the form designer may make use of. This includes a "Due Date" field that may be checked by the forms list filtering. The list filtering was upgraded to enable selecting fields or attributes that do not have a value instead of just those having a value.
HTML tables (including the colspan and rowspan attributes) can now be included in new forms.
An On-Device Data Info command was added to Other Actions.

description.p: TF10000128 - Field titles are now truncated if no short title has been defined and the regular title is too long to fit in the header. Appends "..." to the truncated title.
TF10000129 - Improved support for lists that contain a large number of choices.
TF10000130 - Fixed issue where pinch/zoom was not enabled in iOS when using inAppBrowser()
TF10000131 - Fixed issue where images occasionally did not appear in forms when offline and were repeatedly downloaded unnecessarily when refreshed.
TF10000132 - Support for HTML tables added in new TPL forms: <table>, <tr>,<td>, and the "colspan" and "rowspan" attributes.
